body_html:
I'm using Python 2.7.11. I confirmed that the file exists and is a normal file with normal access permissions.

Unfortunately I am so far unable to reproduce the issue when saving checkpoints for a minimal test case. (The problem persists when tensorboard is given a logdir for checkpoints produced by the non-minimal model that I'm currently training.)

Since it's unclear whether this is actually a TF issue I'll close and reopen if I discover more pertinent information. Thanks!

body:
I'm using Python 2.7.11. I confirmed that the file exists and is a normal file with normal access permissions.

Unfortunately I am so far unable to reproduce the issue when saving checkpoints for a minimal test case. (The problem persists when tensorboard is given a logdir for checkpoints produced by the non-minimal model that I'm currently training.)

Since it's unclear whether this is actually a TF issue I'll close and reopen if I discover more pertinent information. Thanks!
